categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Felucia system was an Outer Rim star system located in the Thanium sector that contained the planet Felucia. The system was also found in the Trans-Hydian Region on the west side of the Perlemian Trade Route.
The Felucia system first appeared via the planet of Felucia in the 2005 film Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. It was first identified the game Star Wars: Galactic Defense.
